home1: In 2018, I had my first experience with programming in high school, where I learned the Pascal language. After a break, I resumed programming in C in college, currently majoring in Information Systems
home2: During this period, I developed an interest in web development, studying HTML, CSS, and JavaScript independently. Currently, I am focusing my studies on back-end development and mainly work with data integration, especially between databases and APIs, using SQL.
home3: On this website, you will find information about me, my resume, and my blog, where I intend to share my knowledge and experiences. Additionally, you can check out some of my projects below.
